videoTitle: ＂Don’t Learn to Code＂ Is WRONG ｜ GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke

transcript.text: I first of all I strongly believe that
every kid uh every child should learn
coding. We should actually teach them

teach them physics and geography and uh
you know literacy and math and whatn
not. Those are all fundamental skills.
Coding is one such skill because
software is everywhere and in fact our

travel um wake up in the morning without

readonly mode but also be able to create
uh things ourselves or at least
understand how how creation is done on

my role is mostly being the GitHub CEO

because it was before that you would

I think the unique thing about GitHub is
